abbreviateSkills.hint: If enabled, skills and abilities will use a three-character abbreviation.
abbreviateSkills.name: Abbreviate Skill and Ability Names

displaySpellInfo.hint: If enabled, spell component information, concentration, and ritual status will be noted next to the spell name.
displaySpellInfo.name: Display spell information

showItemsWithoutActivationCosts.hint: Show items without an activation cost
showItemsWithoutActivationCosts.name: Show Items without Activation Costs

showSlowActions.hint: Pokaż działania, które trwają dłużej niż jedną rundę
showSlowActions.name: Pokaż powolne działania

showUnchargedItems.hint: If enabled, items are shown in the HUD even if they have no remaining charges.
showUnchargedItems.name: Show empty items (includes items and spells)

showUnequippedItems.hint: If enabled, all items are shown for NPCs, not just equipped items.
showUnequippedItems.name: Show all NPC items

showUnpreparedSpells.hint: If disabled, spells such as cantrips, innate, pact, and at-will spells need to be 'prepared' via the spell details to be shown on the HUD.
showUnpreparedSpells.name: Show all non-preparable spells
